task.title: Adding a meeting
task.shortdesc: The creating a new room option allows users to create a new meeting room in the task pane.

context.p:
When the user creates a new room, the user can set:
Name
Password
Moderated
Room Moderators
Allow guests
Enable dial-in

step.cmd: Enter a name in the name field.
Click Password protected if you want the meeting to be protected by a password.
Click Moderated if you want the meet to be moderator-led.

info.note: You can select Moderators from the attendees listed in the Outlook meeting.

step.cmd: Click guest access to allow guest users to access the meeting link.
The task pane closes, and the room information updates to the Outlook meeting.
